name: 1123 Puzzle
description:
Welcome to 1123!

A puzzle game about connecting the dots and number. 1123 is made by combining classic “connect the dots” game with number, to bring you a new, relaxing experience.

How to Play

The goal is simple: score as much as possible by connecting same-colored dots vertically and horizontally. The connected dots will combine and their number increases, and you can connect it with bigger dots.

Make a square to destroy all dots of the same color, and win even more!

Features

Here’s what you get from 1123
•    FREE to play.
•    Minimalistic flat design.
•    Play everywhere, even in offline.
